```{r}
#devtools::install_github("osazuwa223/igraphr")
library(igraph)
library(igraphr)
```

The generation of graphs in igraph does not provide many options.  The following functions generate highly connected DAGs.

```{r}
g <- generateMultiConnectedDAG(10)
igraphVizPlot(g)
```

```{r}
g <- layerDAGs(3, 4)
igraphVizPlot(g)
```

```{r}
g <- layerDAGs(6, 10)
igraphVizPlot(g)
```
